text: Mankolangal is a 2000 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Subrahmanian Santakumar, starring Manikandan Pattambi and Beena Antony in the lead roles. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Mankolangal- selected-for-screening-in-3-film-festivals/articleshow/1098523507.cms ==Cast== * Beena Antony * Manikandan Pattambi * Mahima * Viplavam Balan * Seema G Nair * PJ Unnikrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Mankolangal
